A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Here's the deal with this movie\, it is like a bad sci-fi movie with elements of Star Wars used as props.  There are AT-ATs\, lightsabers and Yoda but this movie does not function as a bridge in a trilogy.  It neglected what came before it and makes me nervous about what could possibly follow it.  There was no contextualization present and that is why it failed as a so called part of this franchise.
